_sText:
cs_assault_zt
_____________
by zeta

_________________

Introduction
_________________

This is the final release of my remake of assault, with
the previous version being an incomplete rushed piece of 
rubbish. I really hope this tides everyone over untill 
valve get around to recreating it themselves.


There are a couple of easter eggs hidden in the map. See
how long it takes you to find them ;) 

(hint : noclip might be usefull)

Have fun!

_________________



Installation
_________________



Simply extract all files in the zip too:


C:\Steam\SteamApps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike


And you're done.


_________________

along with all the custom source content you'll ever need!
